page.title: 01East Leicester _ Gazeteer.
page.content: The block is east of Leicester's city centre and main shopping area but within easy reach of it, being well served by public transport.The D block extends from busy terraced streets in the inner city area, through 1930's semis and council development to large detatched properties on the outskirts. It is a densely populated multi- cultural area; a mix of established communities and recently settled ethnic groups. English mingles with Asian, African and other European languages. Mosques, Gurdwaras and specialised shops are common. The area is very self contained,people working within easy distance of their homes and local amenities providing every service required by people in their everyday lives.
